document.full_text: looking for loose change to feed a parking meter might also help feed the homeless and ward off panhandling, say sponsors of a new charity program unveiled in utah's capital on thursday.
document.title: special utah parking meters to collect coins for homeless
lines_and_colors: looking for loose change to feed a parking meter might also help feed the homeless and ward off panhandling, say sponsors of a new charity program unveiled in utah's capital on thursday.
